name: site-domaine
description: Site Elevage du Domaine de Montdenis

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run stylelint && npm run html && npm run style && npm run js && npm run img && npm run favicon && npm run cache
scripts.start: viws -tls=false -directory ${INIT_CWD}/src/ -csp "default-src 'self'; base-uri 'self'; script-src 'self' api.tiles.mapbox.com; style-src 'self' cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/normalize.css@8.0.0/ api.tiles.mapbox.com; img-src 'self' data: blob:; font-src 'self' fonts.googleapis.com; connect-src 'self' *.mapbox.com; child-src 'self' blob:" -headers X-UA-Compatible:ie=edge~content-language:fr

author: Vincent Boutour
